## Contributor Application

Thank you for your interest in becoming a PermitIndex contributor! Please fill out the information below.

**Full Name:**
[Your full name]

**Location:**
City: [Your city]
State: [Your state]

**Professional Background:**
[Brief description of your experience with permits - e.g., "Permit expediter with 10 years experience", "Former city planning official", "Business consultant specializing in restaurant licensing"]

**Website/LinkedIn:**
[Your professional website or LinkedIn profile URL]

**Email:**
[Your email address]

### Your Expertise

**Which permit types can you verify?**
[List specific permit types, e.g., "Food Truck Permits, Business Licenses, Health Permits"]

**Which jurisdictions do you know well?**
[List specific cities/counties/regions]

**Why do you want to contribute?**
[Your motivation - e.g., "Help my local business community", "Build professional reputation", "Improve permit information accuracy"]

### Commitment

By applying, I commit to:
- [ ] Providing accurate, up-to-date permit information
- [ ] Reviewing and updating my jurisdiction's permit data quarterly
- [ ] Responding to questions about permits I've verified (optional)

**How did you hear about PermitIndex?**
[Your answer]

**Anything else we should know?**
[Optional additional context]

---

**Next Steps:**
After submitting this application, our team will review it within 5-7 business days. If approved, we'll add your profile to the Contributors Directory and reach out about which permits to verify first.
